.. _`bio/samtools/idxstats`:

SAMTOOLS IDXSTATS
=================

Use samtools to retrieve and print stats form indexed bam, sam or cram files. For more information see `SAMtools documentation <http://www.htslib.org/doc/samtools-idxstats.html>`_.


Example
-------

This wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule samtools_idxstats:
        input:
            bam="mapped/{sample}.bam",
            idx="mapped/{sample}.bam.bai"
        output:
            "mapped/{sample}.bam.idxstats"
        log:
            "logs/samtools/idxstats/{sample}.log"
        wrapper:
            "0.71.1-437-g937888931/bio/samtools/idxstats"

Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.

Software dependencies
---------------------

* ``samtools==1.10``

Input/Output
------------
**Input:**

* indexed sam, bam or cram file (.sam, .bam, .cram)
* corresponding index files

**Output:**

* idxstat file (.idxstats)
